title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 117.1 - Scope of part
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 117.1 - Scope of part

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to establish standards for the
screening of every new entrant to the schools to determine which students are
possibly gifted, have or are suspected of having a disability in accordance
with subdivision (6) of section
3208
of the

Education Law and/or possibly are limited English proficient in accordance with
subdivision 2-a of section
3204
of the

Education Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
117.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
